playback: Stills & Videos: Auto Rotate (Automatic vertical/horizontal detection), Image Advance (Transition Effects, Scroll Display), Rotate, Favorites, My Category, Smart Shuffle, Group Playback, Slideshow (Repeat, Interval, Effect) Still Images: Single, Index (6-100 thumbnails), Magnification (2-10x), Information Display, Red-eye Correction, i-Contrast, Resize, My Colors, Histogram, Overexposure Warning Videos: Normal Playback, Skip Backward, Previous Frame, Next Frame, Skip Forward
exposurecompensation: -2 EV to +2 EV in increments of 1/3 EV
flashmode: Auto, Flash On, Slow Synchro, Flash Off
batterylife: Shooting Capacity Approx. 190 shots Approx. 260 shots in ECO Mode Playback Time Approx. 5 hours
continuousdrive: Normal: Approx. 0.8 shots/sec. (in P mode) Normal: Approx. 3.2 shots/sec. (in Low Light mode)
meteringsystem: Evaluative*, Center-weighted average, Spot** * Facial brightness is evaluated in Face Detection AF. ** Metering frame is fixed to the center.
shootingmodes: P, Live View Control, Auto, Portrait, Face Self-timer, Low Light, Fish-eye Effect, Miniature Effect, Toy Camera Effect, Monochrome, Super Vivid, Poster Effect, Snow, Fireworks, Long Shutter
